name: mach-punch
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.
flavor_text.platinum: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.
